nodes.text: Glaze sauce was a type of sauce that could be eaten with carni chips. While staying at the Canto Casino Hotel in the city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica in 34 ABY, the Wermal salesbeing Kedpin Shoklop noticed carni chips with glaze sauce among many other types of food served during midmeal.

Glaze sauce was mentioned in the 2017 short story "Rules of the Game," written by Saladin Ahmed for the novella collection Canto Bight, which was released as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi multimedia project.
